    Methods in org.springframework.orm.hibernate5 with parameters of type LocalSessionFactoryBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected SessionFactory
    LocalSessionFactoryBean.buildSessionFactory(LocalSessionFactoryBuilder sfb)
    Subclasses can override this method to perform custom initialization of the SessionFactory instance, creating it via the given Configuration object that got prepared by this LocalSessionFactoryBean.
